keyMoments.title: Sun Pirates Return to Fish-Man Island with Amnesty
keyMoments.description: Following Jinbe's acceptance as a Shichibukai, the Sun Pirates officially disband and return to Fish-Man Island as free citizens. Their past crimes as pirates are pardoned due to Jinbe's Warlord status.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the end of the Sun Pirates as an active pirate crew and represents a major step toward peace for Fish-Man Island. The former slaves can now live freely without being hunted.

reveals.information: Sun Pirates disband and return to Fish-Man Island with amnesty after Jinbe becomes Shichibukai
